pr_title: FIX: field function name letter case preserved in select with group by

timeline.author: penghuo
penghuo

replies.bodyText: Becase response object comparison does not ignore letter case in schema.name. Thus I used assertTrue together with .equalsIgnoreCase.
replies.author: chenqi0805

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to make it as the function to avoid duplicate code in all the test cases?
timeline.author: penghuo

timeline.bodyText: Is it the same function used in SQLToOperatorConverter?
timeline.author: penghuo

replies.bodyText: Same logic. Might be duplicate code with the intent to keep parserTest separate from converter.
replies.author: chenqi0805

timeline.bodyText: Instead of just extracting the selectMethodNames, Is it possible to generate the final select name list regardless the field is method or not?
timeline.author: penghuo

replies.bodyText: After putting some extra thought, one way to make the code cleaner is to move the name extraction function and lowercase normalization function into the SQLAggregationParser.parse logic.
replies.author: chenqi0805

timeline.bodyText: Avoid to use null value, Consider to use Optional if it is necessary.
timeline.author: penghuo
